summary: This is the first mod I have ever developed, so don\'t install this without a backup. The mod is really simple and just adds an follower to the game. This is just the beginning, so I have not started to make it balanced and so on :D
descriptionHtml:
[i]First of all I want to say that this is my first mod for Skyrim ever. And this is really just for testing and trying to learn the Creation Kit for Skyrim.[/i]

[font=\"Campus Relief\"][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/font]
The mod is very simple and adds a follower named Heracles. He can be found in the room to the left when you go into Farengars room in Dragonsreach. He wears full steel armor and has a glass longsword with paralysis IV.

[font=\"Campus Relief\"][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/font]
Either use NMM or just drop the .esp file into Skyrim/Data
You can\'t install both the regular and the apacii version at the same time

[font=\"Campus Relief\"][b]REQUIREMENTS[/b][/font]
Skyrim
Apacii (For the Apacii version)

[font=\"Campus Relief\"][b]INCOMPABILITIES[/b][/font]
I have\'nt discovered any, but please let me know if you find any

[font=\"Campus Relief\"][b]FUTURE PLANS [/b][/font][list]
[*] I plan on making it so that you need to complete a really difficult quest to get him to join you.
[*] [s]Balance his armor/weapons etc.[/s]
[*] Add voice
[*] Make him accessible for level # only
[*] Design him myself
[/list]
If you have any ideas feel free to PM me or leave a comment :D
author: Fredrik August Madsen-Malmo

files.name: Heracles
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed a problem where the follower would'nt spawn
Gave him a enchanted glass longsword with paralysis IV

files.name: Heracles Apacii
files.changelogHtml:
Made him lvl. 17
He will level up to 100
Fixed some issues with incompability
